thread.title: “Eğitim bölgeleri emlak seçiminde etkili olacak”
thread.title_full: “Eğitim bölgeleri emlak seçiminde etkili olacak” | Erzurum Flaş Haber

posts.author: erzurumflas.com
posts.title: “Eğitim bölgeleri emlak seçiminde etkili olacak”
posts.text:
Altın Emlak Genel Müdürü Mustafa Hakan Özelmacıklı, TEOG yerine uygulanacak olan yeni sistemin konut tercihlerinde etkili bir faktör olacağını söyledi.
Altın Emlak Genel Müdürü Mustafa Hakan Özelmacıklı, Milli Eğitim Bakanı İsmet Yılmaz’ın açıkladığı ve TEOG yerine uygulanacak olan yeni sistemin konut tercihlerinde etkili bir faktör olacağını belirtti. Yeni sistemdeki eğitim bölgesi ve sınavsız mahalli yerleştirme hakkında değerlendirmelerde bulunan Özelmacıklı “2017 yılında TEOG’a giren öğrenci sayısı bir milyon yüz binden fazla. Yeni sistem ile öğrenciler sınavsız olarak kendilerine en yakın beş liseden birini seçebilecek. Buna göre velilerin kiralık ya da satılık taşınmaz seçiminde artık eğitim bölgeleri çok önemli bir etken olacaktır. Bizler de portföy tanıtımlarımıza eğitim bölgelerini ilave ederek bu seçimlerde velilere kolaylık sağlayacağız” dedi.
“Eğitim bölgeleri açıklanmalı”
Eğitim bölgelerinin ve sınavsız girilecek okulların erken açıklanmasının faydalı olacağını belirten Özelmacıklı, “Ağustos ayında açıklanan yönergeye göre her il/ilçe bir eğitim bölgesi kabul ediliyor. Eğer nüfus 30.000’den fazla ise, okul türleri, ulaşım, coğrafi bütünlük gibi kriterler ile birden fazla eğitim bölgesi oluşacak. Bu bölgelerin sayısı büyükşehirlerde en fazla 15, diğer yerleşim merkezlerinde ise en fazla 5 olabilecek” diye konuştu.
“Mevcut okullar harita üzerinden görülebilir”
Milli Eğitim Bakanlığının internet sayfasından okulların yerlerinin harita üzerinden görülebileceğini söyleyen Özelmacıklı, “Ayrıca belediyelerin kent rehberi veya şehir rehberi uygulamaları üzerinden okulların taşınmazlara olan mesafeleri kontrol edilebilir. Birçok büyükşehir belediyesinde var olan uygulamalar ile yakındaki okullar da listelenebilir” dedi.

thread.title: Bachelet recorrió Hospital de Talca e inauguró Cescof “Carlos Trupp”
thread.title_full: Bachelet recorrió Hospital de Talca e inauguró Cescof “Carlos Trupp”

posts.author: lpweb
posts.title: Bachelet recorrió Hospital de Talca e inauguró Cescof “Carlos Trupp”
posts.text: Conectar a Facebook Bachelet recorrió Hospital de Talca e inauguró Cescof “Carlos Trupp” TALCA . La Presidenta de la República, Michelle Bachelet, inauguró ayer el Centro Comunitario de Salud Familiar (Cecosf) “Carlos Trupp” de Talca, iniciativa que se enmarca en el plan nacional de inversión pública en salud. El establecimiento favorecerá a siete mil 382 personas, tras una inversión que superó los 381 millones de pesos. El centro dependerá técnica y administrativamente del Cesfam del mismo nombre y, por lo tanto, parte de las acciones de salud podrán realizarse en el establecimiento recién inaugurado, de acuerdo a las decisiones que adopte el equipo de salud. “Hablamos de un espacio que, en sus más de 240 metros cuadrados de superficie, viene a dar respuesta concreta y cercana a los vecinos y vecinas de este sector de la comuna de Talca, que crece día a día y que así también demanda mayor atención de salud”, comentó la Mandataria. Además, resaltó que este modelo permite “hacer que la salud primaria sea más cercana a las personas. Entender que tener una buena salud pasa por prevenir y cuidarse antes de enfermarse y en ese sentido contar con un centro cercano, con profesionales que conocen la historia a los vecinos ayuda, no se imaginan cuánto”. La gobernante explicó que el área de la salud cambia constantemente debido a los contextos, avances de la ciencia y cambios demográficos; “entonces, los Cecosf -destacó- son un aporte a la comunidad, porque permite descongestionar los Cesfam, y evita que los usuarios se desplacen distancias extensas”. Asimismo, ejemplificó con los Servicios de Alta Resolutividad (SAR) y resaltó que, gracias a la buena infraestructura y equipamiento, permiten resolver problemas de urgencias de las personas. En Talca ya está en operación el SAR La Florida, y el SAR Las Américas ya está adjudicado. A ello, se suman otros seis SAR terminados y dos adjudicados en la Región, potenciando los avances para la atención de urgencia en la salud primaria. “Así hemos trabajado, con fuerza y mucha decisión, invirtiendo recursos históricos para mejorar la infraestructura de salud en todo el país. Mejorando en áreas que estaban muy débiles como la atención dental, donde hoy existe una oferta específica para las mujeres, los más pequeñitos y los jóvenes que egresan de cuarto medio”, dijo. La dotación del Cecosf está compuesta por un médico; un dentista; una enfermera; un nutricionista; dos asistentes sociales; un kinesiólogo; tres TENS; tres administrativos; y un auxiliar. Y se contempla los siguientes recintos: Box Clínicos (Dental, gineco-obstétrico, procedimientos); box consulta, áreas Técnicas, SOME, sala de espera, botiquín y bodega. Previamente, la Presidenta realizó un breve recorrido por el Hospital de Talca, donde descubrió una placa conmemorativa, aunque no fue una inauguración propiamente tal. Be Sociable, Share! 07/11/2017 | Archivado bajo: Principal , Región , Talca

posts.title: ProCult, Mostra del Cinema Rumeno: dal 10 al 12 novembre
posts.text:
ProCult, Mostra del Cinema Rumeno: dal 10 al 12 novembre 
Dal 10 al 12 novembre si svolgerà l’VIII edizione di ProCult, la Mostra cinematografica dedicata al cinema della Romania: 3 giorni di proiezioni gratuite presso l’Accademia di Romania e la Casa del Cinema. Tra documentari e lungometraggi il cinema rumeno ci mostra un Paese dalle mille sfaccettature, ricco di storia, emozioni e ironia. Venerdì 10 novembre Accademia di Romania “Wild Carpathia” di Charley Ottley Sabato 11 novembre Casa del Cinema “Doppio” di Catrinel Danaita Ore 19:00 Casa del Cinema “A casa di papà” di Andrei Cohn Domenica 12 novembre Casa del Cinema “I geni salvati” di Cristina Tilica“Costanza Sessantacinque” di Tudor Chirila Ore 19:00  43 Nessun commento: Sostieni il nostro sito con una piccola donazione! Susţine site-ul nostru cu o mică donaţie! Archivio blog 
Inserisci la tua email per ricevere le news: Commenti recenti luisa Contatti Inviaci i tuoi articoli e/o comunicati stampa per pubblicizzare eventi oppure segnalaci i link di articoli interessanti all'indirizzo !Aiutaci a migliorare il sito con le tue proposte!Intră în echipa noastră! Il sito “La comunità romena in Italia” fornisce dal mese di giugno 2008 informazioni utili per un soggiorno migliore. Le informazioni sono rivolte non soltanto ai cittadini romeni, ma a tutti coloro che vivono in Italia. Le informazioni sono postate in due lingue, per dare la possibilità ai romeni di leggere le notizie che riguardano il nostro paese in lingua originale, mentre le notizie sull'immigrazione e sull'Italia sono comprensibilmente in italiano, perché siano di accesso generale e perché favoriscano una maggiore dimestichezza con la lingua italiana. Gli articoli sono raccolti, secondo gli intenti del sito, in base all’attendibilità dell’istituzione e/o della testata giornalistica (italiana, romena o altro), nel rispetto del Dlgs 68/03 sui diritti d’autore (ogni articolo contiene la fonte da cui proviene, con eventuale link alla testata giornalistica, divenendo una pubblicità ed un contributo ulteriore alla loro diffusione). , autrice del sito Copyright © 2008 La comunità romena in Italia. Tutti i diritti riservati.

thread.title: Surprise measure today in Wisconsin could lead to drastic implications to Constitution
thread.title_full: Surprise measure today in Wisconsin could lead to drastic implications to Constitution

posts.author: Mitch Reynolds (mitch@1410wizm.com)
posts.title: Surprise measure today in Wisconsin could lead to drastic implications to Constitution
posts.text:
Tuesday - November 7, 2017 2:52 am Surprise measure today in Wisconsin could lead to drastic implications to Constitution Be the first to comment! End game could mean changes like civil rights, women's rights, voting rights 
Whether Wisconsin becomes the next state to join the movement for a national Constitutional convention keys on a vote by the state Senate today. 
It was a surprise measure that was added in the 11th hour to the Senate.   Assembly approves GOP bill blocking most abortions under state health insurance plans 
Approval means the state becomes the 28th out of 34 needed to hold a convention, which could lead to just about any kind of changes in the nation's most important founding document, says Jay Heck from Wisconsin Common Cause. 
"They say that all they want to do is pass a balanced-budget amendment," Heck said, "but there's no curb on other things that they could do." 
The Assembly has already approved the measure. Wisconsin Gov. Scott Walker is not required to act on the legislation. 
There hasn't been a Constitutional convention since 1787. The Constitution has been amended, however, 27 times, through two-thirds approval by both the House and Senate. 
Either way, any amendment must also be ratified by three-fourths of the states (38) to become part of the Constitution. 
Heck and others warn a convention could have significant national implications, like civil rights, women's rights, voting rights. 
"There's no guarantee that another Constitutional convention were convened, that the folks that gather, couldn't change the complexion to the United States and do anything they wanted to the Constitution," Heck said. 
And that could be a potential disaster, Heck added. 
"They could, for instance, decide that only men should vote or that African-Americans shouldn't be citizens," he said. "There are all kinds of things that could be done at a Constitutional convention of this type." 
Those pushing the convention say it is only meant as a way to adopt a Constitutional amendment mandating a federal balanced budget. Last modified on Tuesday - November 7, 2017 3:04 am

thread.title: FOTOD | L.A-s maailmakuulsate dragide seltskonda nautiv Eesti neiu Mia: on igaühe vaba valik, mida ta oma kehaga teeb
thread.title_full: FOTOD | L.A-s maailmakuulsate dragide seltskonda nautiv Eesti neiu Mia: on igaühe vaba valik, mida ta oma kehaga teeb

posts.title: FOTOD | L.A-s maailmakuulsate dragide seltskonda nautiv Eesti neiu Mia: on igaühe vaba valik, mida ta oma kehaga teeb
posts.text:
Mängud 07.11.2017, 11:39 FOTOD | L.A-s maailmakuulsate drag ide seltskonda nautiv Eesti neiu Mia: on igaühe vaba valik, mida ta oma kehaga teeb RUS Foto: Instagram @Miaestonia Kolm kuud tagasi kolis noor eestlanna Mia Rahi õpilasvahetusprogrammi raames Los Angelesse, et tegeleda kunsti, laulu ja tantsuga. Oma nädalavahetused veedab ta aga väga erinevates suhtlusringkondades, kust sageli ei puudu ka üks drag show või pidu, kus ta ka ise end drag iks teeb. 
"Esimene mälestus dragi-vaimustusest on mul 2014. aasta Eurovisiooni aegadest, kui nägin Conchita Wursti, kelle edus olin kohe veendunud," meenutab Mia iluportaalile Stiil antud intervjuus. 
Sama aasta sügisel komistasi Mia internetiavarustes uuesti dragkultuuri otsa, kui avastas Willami, kes on siiani minu suurim drag-lemmik: "Mõnda aega jälgisin drag queenidest ainult teda, aga siis avastasin tema kaudu telesaate ”Rupaul’s Drag Race”, kust on läbi käinud suur osa drag queen induse tippusid." 
"Vaatasin magamata ära terveid hooaegasid. Talendihulk, mida seal näeb on tohutu: drag queen id peavad oskama teha kõike alates sketši kirjutamisest pükskostüümi õmblemiseni," räägib Mia, kuidas ta leidis endale uue imelise maailma. 
Mia ütleb, et ei oleks üldsegi osanud ette kujutada, et mõne drag queen iga kunagi kohtudagi võiks, kuna see pole Eestis kuidagi teema: "Seda uskumatum on minu jaoks see, et mõned minu lemmikud drag queen id kutsuvad mind tänasel päeval enda sõbraks." 
"Paar kuud hiljem käisin oma elu esimesel drag show l Inglismaal – selle sain kingitusena oma sünnipäevaks. See oli tõeline kannapööre minu elus. Drag -kogukonnast on mul tekkinud teine perekond. Läbi drag -kultuuri tundmaõppimise olen ennast paremini kui kunagi varem tundma õppinud – tegemist on minu tõelise kirega," seletab ta. 
Hetkel Los Angeleses resideeriv kaunitar arvab, et tema uhtumine ilukirurgiasse ei lähe tõenaoliselt kokku just tavalise arvamusega, eriti Eestis: "Ilukirurgia populaarsus on suurem kui kunagi varem ja kindlasti tuleb rääkida ka selle ohtudest, kuid leian siiski, et see on igaühe vaba valik, mida tema oma kehaga teeb." 
"Minu jaoks peitub üleliigses ilukirurgias lausa omamoodi ilu ja kunst – see näitab pingutusi, mida inimesed on igavese ilu otsingute nimel valmis tegema ja ennast selle kaudu väljendama," ütleb Mia. "Heaks näiteks on naine, kes on tuntud kui maailma kalleima kehaga inimene: Amanda Lepore."

thread.title: iPhone X tuo Applelle sievoisen katteen – suurempi myös suhteellisesti kuin iPhone 8:ssa
thread.title_full: Mobiili.fi - iPhone X tuo Applelle sievoisen katteen – suurempi myös suhteellisesti kuin iPhone 8:ssa | Matkapuhelinfoorumi - Suosituin matkapuhelinpalsta

posts.author: Uutissyöte
posts.title: iPhone X tuo Applelle sievoisen katteen – suurempi myös suhteellisesti kuin iPhone 8:ssa
posts.text:
iPhone X ja iPhone 8 sekä iPhone 8 Plus.
Applen iPhone X:stä on sen myyntiintulon jälkeen saatu nyt jällleen uusi arvio sen komponenttien hinnasta ja näin Applen tuotteella keräämästä bruttokatteesta.
TechInsights arvioi analyysinsa perusteella iPhone X:n 64 gigatavun malliversion valmistamisen maksavan yhteensä 357.50 dollaria. Puhelimen vähittäismyyntihinta on 999 dollaria ennen veroja Yhdysvalloissa.
Applen bruttokatteeksi iPhone X:stä arvioidaan näin jopa 64 prosenttia, kun esimerkiksi uuden iPhone 8:n kate yltää vastaavasti 59 prosenttiin.
Arviot eri älypuhelinten valmistuskustannuksista ovat kuitenkin monilta osin arpapeliä. Esimerkiksi TechInsights arvioi nyt iPhone X:n uuden OLED-näyttöpaneelin ja sen liitännäisten komponenttien kustannukseksi 65,50 dollaria. Applea läheisesti seuraava KGI Securitiesin analyytikko Ming-chi Kuo on kuitenkin aiemmin arvioinut Applen maksavan iPhone X:n OLED-näyttöpaneelista Samsungille 120-130 dollaria . Yksittäistenkin komponenttien hinta-arvioilla voi näin olla suuria vaikutuksia koko analyysin lopputulokseen.
TechInsights puolestaan arvioi toisen iPhone X:n kalliimman komponentin olevan sen ruostumattomasta teräksestä valmistetun rungon, jonka kustannukseksi arvioidaan 36 dollaria verrattuna iPhone 8:n 21,50 dollarin alumiinirunkoon. Lisäkustannuksia aiheutuu myös Face ID -kasvontunnistuksen vaatimista lisäkomponenteista.
Koko Applen liiketoiminnan bruttokate on ollut viime aikoina vajaat 40 prosenttia, mutta iPhonen on arvioitu olevan Applelle hieman kokonaistasoa kannattavampi tuote. Todellisuudessa iPhone-myynnin bruttokate yltänee 40-50 prosenttiin, mutta jää myös iPhone X:n osalta TechInsightsin nyt arvioimasta hurjasta 64 prosentista.
Lisäksi kannattaa huomioida, että kaikissa puhelinten kustannusanalyyseissä huomioidaan vain komponentti- ja valmistuskustannukset. Muut liiketoiminnan kulut tutkimuksesta ja tuotekehityksestä myyntiin ja markkinointiin ja sivuutetaan näissä arvioissa kiinteinä kuluina.

thread.title_full: Microsoft releases its £450 Xbox One X which developers describe as the 'world's most powerful console'

posts.author: Les7799
posts.title: Microsoft releases its £450 Xbox One X which developers describe as the 'world's most powerful console'
posts.text: Microsoft releases its £450 Xbox One X which developers describe as the 'world's most powerful console' Mail Online | 11/7/2017 | Mark Prigg;Ellie Zolfagharifard;Phoebe Weston For Mailonline in General Your browser does not support HTML5 video.The latest version of the Xbox, which developer Microsoft says is the 'world's most powerful console', has gone on sale globally.The sleek £450 ($499) Xbox One X is a high-end version of Microsoft's Xbox console with souped-up features aimed at making 4K gaming mainstream. Specifications - Cent - Games - Market - Teraflops According to its specifications, it is 40 per cent more powerful than any other games console on the market - its six teraflops of internal graphical computing power surpass the 4.2 found in Sony's flagship PlayStation4 Pro. The Xbox One X runs on the same accessories and games as its predecessor, but with hugely improved power, providing unprecedented audio and 4K visual capabilities. Power - Increase - Size - Console - Size More power hasn't led to an increase in size of the minimalist-style console, which is roughly the same size as the Xbox One S.It's also quiet. It uses a vapour chamber cooling system so that the console produces a soft hum even when playing games such as Gears of War 4 in 4K. Console - HDD - Faster - Times - USB The console features a new HDD for faster loading times, three USB slots, and the standard optical, IR Blaster and HDMI ports.The One X is likely to face strong competition from PlayStation and Nintendo over the Christmas period but the firm's UK boss said he believes the new system offers a 'better gaming experience'. Anyone - £450 So why would anyone shell out £450 ($499)?Eagle says the main reason is its ability to render games in High Dynamic Range (HDR) at a native 4K resolution, which is four times the pixels of a standard full HD 1080p image. CPU - Xbox - One - S - Quality It uses eight-core 2.3GHz CPU compared to 1.4 in the Xbox One S. This all leads to higher quality textures and smoother rendering.Games including Forza Motorsport 7 and Assassin's Creed Origins will support the full range of performance upgrades including 4K resolution, HDR, and 60fps. 'If you...   Mail Online 3

thread.title: 黒髪の白人さん。金髪の白人さんと白人も色々違うでしょうか？日本人はみんな黒...
thread.title_full: 黒髪の白人さん。金髪の白人さんと白人も色々違うでしょうか？日本人はみんな黒... - Yahoo!知恵袋

posts.author: exhibit_10
posts.text:
日本人でも幅があります。
人種や地域を問わず、皮膚・髪・虹彩（目の色が付いている部分）は、ヒトに発現する可能性がある範囲の色であれば、あらゆる色になる可能性があります。
ただ、個人が持つ色素の種類と色素量の多寡（多いほど濃くなる）は遺伝により決まるため、両親や祖父母と共通か、少なくとも近い範囲になる確率が非常に高いため、大雑把には国や地域での典型例があります。
日本人の多数派である「黒髪」は、正しくは焦げ茶であり、アフリカ系に見られる黒とは異なります。
また、肌と髪の色を決める２種類の色素は同じものなので、肌の色が明るいと髪も明るく、逆も同様になりやすいですが、稀に極端に違った形になることもあります。

thread.title: No somos princesas, somos reinas creadoras - Diario Progresista
thread.title_full: No somos princesas, somos reinas creadoras - Diario Progresista

posts.author: Author Redacci N Colaboradores
posts.title: No somos princesas, somos reinas creadoras - Diario Progresista
posts.text:
No somos princesas, somos reinas creadoras Author Redacción/Colaboradores Posted on 
Por Carolina Gutiérrez Montero (investigadora biomédica) Esta frase escuchada en la feria de Inteligencia Artificial AIshow , que se celebró la semana pasada, engloba muy bien lo que sentimos muchas mujeres que trabajamos en el campo de la investigación y la innovación científica y tecnológica. En esta reunión un grupo de mujeres estuvieron debatiendo sobre la importancia de tratar el problema de la desigualdad de género en el campo de la tecnología desde diferentes ámbitos, siendo de gran importancia la educación: enseñar desde las escuelas que la tecnología, la innovación y la ciencia también es cosa de chicas. Solo el 30% de los trabajadores en el sector tecnológico en Europa son mujeres, y de forma específica en España este sector solo está ocupado por un 18% según datos del Ministerio de Sanidad, Servicios Sociales e Igualdad. Los datos del Ministerio de Educación indican que las matriculas universitarias de mujeres suponen más del 50% de las totales en España, sin embargo, una carrera como la Ingeniería Informática solo la cursan un 10% de mujeres. Aún siendo menos, sus notas destacan por ser mejores que las de los hombres. Las mujeres tenemos claramente una estructura cerebral y una forma de pensar diferente pero a la vez complementaria a la de los hombres. Esto podría incluso ayudar a que las empresas tengan una manera y unos productos a crear diferentes a los pensados solo por hombres. Es decir, la propia desigualdad de género en el sector tecnológico afecta en ocasiones a los productos que fabrica la industria. Algo totalmente evitable si se contase más con nosotras en este sector que por cierto abarca amplias disciplinas académicas. Un estudio llevado a cabo en el año 2013 en la Unión Europea puso de manifiesto que una mayor presencia de las mujeres en el sector tecnológico a nivel mundial supondría un incremento anual del PIB estimado en 9.000 millones de euros. En la lucha por esta desigualdad el PSOE-M sacó adelante la semana pasada una propuesta para fomentar la igualdad de género en el ámbito científico y tecnológico. Como bien destacan los socialistas, “son necesarias políticas transversales con perspectiva de género en todas las acciones públicas relacionadas con la ciencia, la investigación, la educación y el conocimiento”. 
Es una defensa en toda regla de la promoción de las carreras de las mujeres en los campos de ciencia, ingeniería y tecnología; una defensa de su presencia en puestos de responsabilidad y poder y una defensa del reconocimiento y la visibilización de las mujeres en la ciencia. En ese lugar en el que siempre han estado y en el que nunca han sido reconocidas con la justicia suficiente. En definitiva es la defensa del compromiso socialista con la igualdad de género Aprovechemos el talento femenino, no solo en nuestra Comunidad sino en todo el país, en el mundo entero. Que nuestro trabajo reciba un reconocimiento adecuado, que podamos alcanzar puestos de responsabilidad acordes a nuestra formación, por méritos les puedo asegurar que no será: muchas mujeres tienen tantos o más que gran parte de los hombres que se encuentran por encima de ellas en lo que a responsabilidad estructural se refiere. Valemos mucho, nos lo tenemos que creer nosotras mismas, y se lo tenemos que hacer creer al resto. Como reza el título de este artículo: “No me trates como una princesa consumidora, sino como una reina creadora capaz de cambiar el mundo”. Deja un comentario Tu dirección de correo electrónico no será publicada. Los campos obligatorios están marcados con * Comentario

thread.title: (USA-TX-Wichita Falls) Route Relief / Utility Driver
thread.title_full: (USA-TX-Wichita Falls) Route Relief / Utility Driver

posts.title: (USA-TX-Wichita Falls) Route Relief / Utility Driver
posts.text:
Alsco Inc Route Relief / Utility Driver in Wichita Falls , Texas Description 
Classification: Non-Exempt 
Revised:05/14/2014 
Job Summary: The Route Relief/Utility RSR supports the Service Department in its objectives to meet our customers’ needs through up-selling/cross-selling and providing superior customer service. Main duties are to cover routes and perform service related tasks as required. Reports to the District Manager. 
Essential Functions: 
Perform all responsibilities of a Route Sales Representative and related tasks. 
Learn and support all routes. Run routes as needed for holidays, vacations or other vacancies. 
When not on a route, assist in rush deliveries, renewals, audits, training and any other tasks assigned by supervision. 
Solicit new customers, up-sell/cross-sell/sample all lines of service or product and ensure a profitable product mix. 
Actively participate in promotions and contests, training and audits. 
Follow company policies/procedures regarding new customers, managing customer needs and all aspects of service. 
Ensure customer loyalty and outstanding customer service. Build relationships, communicate openly, educate customers and proactively resolve concerns in cooperation with supervision. 
Safely operate a delivery vehicle on each trip, following all applicable laws and company policy. Maintain vehicle cleanliness and perform regular vehicle inspections. 
Handle and process customer payments. Keep route paperwork current. 
Ensure timely and correct deliveries of complete textile loads, pick up soiled textiles and maintain proper inventories in accounts. Service items such as facility maintenance products. 
Monitor and report competitive activity. Keep service agreements current and renewed. 
Return from route and off load soiled textiles in the receiving area of facility. 
Accurately prepare route paperwork and follow check-in procedures. 
Follow written and verbal instructions and perform other tasks as directed by supervision. 
Additional Functions: Support other service personnel as required by supervision. Requirements 
Have and maintain a valid Driver’s License, CDL when applicable. 
Maintain a driving record free of chargeable accidents, speeding, safety or other violations. 
Demonstrate excellent skills in the operation of vehicles and verifiable minimum one year experience of safe and successful driving. 
Demonstrate excellent skills in customer service and route sales. 
Excellent verbal/written communication skills in English, comprehend and follow direction and good time management skills and team player. 
Recognize colors, sizes and types of product and count, add and subtract accurately. Education: 
High School graduation or similar experience. Qualified drivers license. 
Travel Requirements: Daily, by delivery vehicle within a route. 
Typical Environmental Conditions: 
Operating vehicles on public roads, in and out of customer locations, loading areas of a typical industrial laundry facility, Service Center or depot. 
Indoor and outdoor areas of a typical industrial facility. 
Typical Physical Activity: Physical Demands - sitting, grasping, driving stooping, kneeling, reaching overhead, moving carts up to 500 lbs., lifting up to 75 lbs, standing, walking, writing, speaking, hearing. 
Requisition Number: 17-3073

thread.title: 中国国际时装周Comme Tu Es·刘嘉发布会
thread.title_full: 中国国际时装周Comme Tu Es·刘嘉发布会

posts.author: 吴萌
posts.title: 中国国际时装周Comme Tu Es·刘嘉发布会
posts.text:
时尚 界就有这样一位 设计师 ：“她钟爱法式浪漫的优雅华丽与玩味主义 混搭 ，尤其擅长色彩搭配、材质拼接和设计奢华奇幻图案，将趋势流行元素与实际穿着场合巧妙结合”。没错，她就是“COMME TU ES（你就是你）”个人原创品牌设计师刘嘉。 
2018 中国国际时装周 的帷幕已经拉开，而11月4日将是一个令人期待而又难忘的日子。我们的精致主义潮牌开拓设计师刘嘉，将携手充满甜蜜的“优博布瑞弗尼4段儿童配方牛奶 ”带来她的2018春夏亲子 礼服 系列大秀《王子公主成长记》，带我们唤醒最初的童话公主王子梦。 
Comme Tu Es·刘嘉发布会由本次大秀由中国十大名模毛楚玉、国际新锐名模刘春杰和《小手牵小狗》的萌娃苏菲开场，开场舞由著名芭蕾舞演员韩婧携两位小演员做开场芭蕾舞表演，现场著名主持人陈正飞、钢琴小王子张浩天、演员张朋、辣妈暖暖妈、兔兔妈均到场看秀。 
本次发布会的灵感源自于爱的陪伴和期待，艳丽的花朵、幽雅的植物、灵动的鸟儿、精致的蜻蜓、轻盈的蝴蝶、可爱的甲壳虫等，这些灵感元素充满了童趣，营造出梦幻般的世界。她希望借助这样一组设计主题来承载爱的梦想，从婴儿呱呱坠地到长大成人，过程中呈现了母亲对孩子的成长都充满期待。爱是一种陪伴，而陪伴是最长情的告白，每位母亲都想随时随地记录与孩子一起成长的美好时光，从而给予孩子成长的天真、幸福与快乐。时尚界从来没有什么不可能，是我们用世俗的眼光束缚了自己的翅膀。 
亲子潮牌一直是刘嘉老师的设计灵感和设计理念。正如刘嘉老师所说，在品牌未来的发展中，也将把更多法国简约奢华大胆的设计融入到每一件亲子时装作品中。而这次，她真的实现了。此次大秀中礼服设计元素将更多的被使用和呈现，礼服的设计采用优雅礼服与运动织带元素相结合的创意，活泼、时尚、玩味与经典礼服的结合，运用了印染、刺绣、手工等十几道工序完成雅致低调奢华的礼服系列。公主的优雅俏皮，王子的帅气有型，成长的梦幻美好，独特的视角和创意十足的设计，再一次完美地把时尚和爱编织成了孩子们成长中最大的能量和礼物！设计师刘嘉致力为孩子创造出温暖、美丽且充满爱的成长环境以及温馨乐观的生活氛围。 
每一个公主和王子都是上帝带来的天使，每一件服装都是设计师内心情感和信仰的淋漓诠释。相信这样的雅致奢华、富有内涵的设计，会使得这场时装大秀更加纯粹、自然和温暖。 本文来源：网易时尚 。内部来源 责任编辑：吴萌_NBJS5119 分享到：

thread.title: Badger Sportswear acquires Allison Athletic
thread.title_full: Badger Sportswear acquires Allison Athletic

posts.author: Sara Ehlers
posts.title: Badger Sportswear acquires Allison Athletic
posts.text:
Manufacturer for athletic apparel Badger Sportswear just announced a new acquisition. The company will be taking on company Alleson Athletic, a manufacturer of in-stock uniforms and custom sublimated garments. 
The acquisition works complementary for both organization creating a trade brand sportswear partner for Badger Sportswear. Alleson is known for its market in providing team uniforms while Badger specializes in fan wear, spirit wear and workout apparel. 
"Both Badger Sportswear and Alleson Athletic are known for affordable, high-quality sports apparel that have enabled athletes to perform at their best and fans to show their team spirit," said John Anton, CEO of Badger Sportswear. "By bringing the two businesses together, Badger and Alleson are positioned to better service our customers' athletic apparel needs nationwide." 
Details of the acquisition including pricing were not disclosed. Anton will lead the combined company with Todd Levine, president of Alleson and his team. Levine and his team will report to Anton and will continue to manage Alleson. The transaction is expected to close by the end of this month.

thread.title: British woman 'facing death penalty' in Egypt for carrying painkillers pleads for help in secret message from cell
thread.title_full: British woman 'facing death penalty' in Egypt for carrying painkillers pleads for help in secret message from cell | The Independent

posts.author: Chris Baynes
posts.title: British woman 'facing death penalty' in Egypt for carrying painkillers pleads for help in secret message from cell
posts.text:
A British tourist imprisoned in Egypt after flying into the country with painkillers for her boyfriend has pleaded for help in a secret message passed from behind bars.
Laura Plummer , 33, from Hull, said she had "no idea" she was breaking the law when she entered the country with 290 tramadol pills and naproxen in her suitcase.
She fears she could face the death penalty for drug trafficking for bringing the medication for boyfriend Omar Caboo, 33, who had been suffering severe back pain following a car crash.
In a note from her prison cell, she said: “Please help me get out of this hellhole.
“I don’t know what’s happening. I’m scared. I had no idea that what I was doing was wrong. I thought I was doing a good deed.”
The message was passed to The Sun , which reported Ms Plummer was being kept with 25 women in a 15ft-by-15ft cell. 
Her sister Jayne Sinclair, 40, said: "She's absolutely petrified." 
Ms Plummer was arrested on suspicion of drug trafficking at Hurghada International Airport on the Red Sea coast on 9 October. 
She had packed 29 strips of tramadol, each containing 10 tablets, and some naproxen ahead of flying to visit Mr Caboo. The medication, which reportedly had a street value of just £23 in Egypt, was supplied by a friend who had been prescribed them in the UK.
Tramadol is widely prescribed in Britain but Egypt, in common with many other countries, has strict rules on any drugs containing opioid analgesics . The drug cannot be brought into the country without prior permission from the Ministry of Health.
Ms Plummer reportedly signed a 38-page statement in Arabic which she believed would allow her to leave the airport, but has been incarcerated ever since.
Her brother, James Plummer, 31, said the family has been told she could face up to 25 years in jail, with one lawyer even mentioning the death penalty. Her brother said bringing the tablets into Egypt had been an "innocent, honest mistake", adding: “It’s just blown out of proportion completely."
Ms Plummer's mother and sisters have flown out to visit her amid fears for her welfare. They said her hair was falling out due to stress, she was suffering from an ear infection, and she was still wearing the clothes she travelled in.
“They say she’s unrecognisable," said Mr Plummer. "When they seen her, she’s like a zombie, they said.
“I don’t think she’s tough enough to survive it."
More than 11,000 people have signed a petition calling for her release.
A Foreign Office spokesman said: “We are supporting a British woman and her family following her detention in Egypt.”

thread.title: 조세특례제한법 양도소득세가
thread.title_full: 조세특례제한법 양도소득세가 : 네이버 블로그

posts.author: 이준근변호사
posts.title: 조세특례제한법 양도소득세가
posts.text:
부과처분취소소송 조세특례제한법 양도소득세가 1시간 전 URL 복사 본문 기타 기능 번역보기 http://blog.naver.com/iofpiktzsykrj/221134702639 조세특례제한법은 세의 공평을 기하고 조세정책을 효율적으로 수행함으로써 국민경제의 건전한 발전에 이바지할 목적으로 제정된 법률을 말하는데요 . 최근 여러 사람이 공동 소유한 주택을 임대할 경우 임대호수 계산방법을 어떻게 해야 할지 대해 분쟁이 일어난 사건이 있었습니다 . 오늘은 조세특례제한법 관련 사례를 살펴보겠습니다 .
A 씨는 아버지가 사망하자 다세대 주택의 9 분의 2 지분을 상속 받았는데요 . 어머니 , 형제들과 함께 주택 임대를 하다가 임대기간 합산이 10 년이 넘어 지분을 부동산임대업자에게 양도했습니다 . 구 조세특례제한법 등은 임대주택을 5 호 이상 임대하는 거주자가 신축된 국민주택 등을 2000 년 12 월 31 일 이전에 임대개시하고 10 년이상 임대 후 양도하는 경우에 그 임대주택의 양도로 인한 양도소득세는 면제된다고 규정되어 있는데요 .
A 씨는 양도세 전액을 감면세액으로 신고했지만 관할 세무서는 전체 주택의 호수에 A 씨의 지분을 곱하면 5 호에 미달한다며 양도소득세 감면대상이 아니라고 양도세를 부과했습니다 . 이에 부당함을 느낀 A 씨는 소송을 냈는데요 . 앞서 1,2 심은 세무서의 편을 들어 원고패소 판결을 내렸습니다 .
하지만 대법원의 판결은 달랐는데요 . 대법원 재판부는 여러 사람이 공동 소유한 주택을 임대하여 공동사업을 할 때 주택의 호수 계산은 공동소유자 각자가 임대주택을 임대한 것으로 봐야한다고 설명했습니다 . 이것은 임대인 사망 이후 공동상속인이 함께 임대사업을 할 경우도 적용한다고 지적했는데요 .
조세특례제한법 등은 임태주택의 호수 산정법에 대한 규정이 없기 때문에 공동사업자별로 임대주택 지분비율을 합산해 호수를 계산하는 것이 허용되지 않는다고 밝혔습니다 . 이 방법은 합리성이 없으며 법적 근거도 없다고 설명했는데요 . 또 원심은 상속지분율로 환산해 A 씨가 임대한 주택의 수가 4 호기 때문에 조세특례제한법상 요건을 충족하지 못한다고 했지만 이런 원심의 판단은 특례조항의 주택 호수 산정법에 대한 법리를 오해하여 나온 결과라고 판시했습니다 .
따라서 대법원 재판부는 A 씨가 1 억 8 천만원의 양도소득세 부과처분을 취소해달라며 관할세무서장을 상대로 낸 양도소득세 부과처분 취소소송에서 원고패소한 원심을 깨고 이 사건은 해당고등법원으로 돌려보냈습니다 . 지금까지 조세특례제한법 관련 사례를 살펴보았는데요 . 다세대 주택을상속받아 공동 소유의 주택을 임대할 경우 임대호수 계싼은 개별지분이 아닌 임대주택 전체를 임대한 것으로 봐야 한다는 대법원의 판결이 있었습니다 .
조세관련 소송은 다양한 법리해석이 나올 수 있기 때문에 변호사를 선임하여 함께 대응하는 것이 좋은데요 . 부과처분취소소송 등 조세관련 고민이 있는 분들은 이준근 변호사의 조력을 받아 긍정적인 결과를 이끌어 내시기 바랍니다 .

posts.title: [2017-11-07] 현대카드 사내 성폭행 사건 논란…사측 "개인 간 애정문제"
posts.text:
기자의 다른 기사보기 보도 : 2017.11.07 17:02 수정 : 2017.11.07 17:10 ◆…현대카드 사내 성폭행 논란 
홈 인테리어 기업 한샘에서 발생한 성범죄 사건에 이어 현대카드에서도 성폭행 사건이 발생해 논란이 커지고 있다. 현대카드는 이번 사건을 '개인 간 애정문제'로 판단하고 피해자의 사직서마저 반려한 것으로 알려져 사측의 대응 방식에 문제를 제기하는 목소리도 높아지고 있다.

thread.title: သေဘၤာသီးမွည့္၏ ေကာင္းက်ိဳးမ်ား

posts.author: Pho Thu Taw 1 (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: သေဘၤာသီးမွည့္၏ ေကာင္းက်ိဳးမ်ား
posts.text: က်န္းမာေရး , စားေသာက္ဖြယ္ , ဗဟုသုတ , လူမႈ႔ဘဝ 3:57 PM အဓိကေကာင္းက်ိဳးကေတာ့ မ်က္စိအားေကာင္းေစၿပီး ဝမ္းမွန္ေစတာပါပဲ။သေဘၤာသီးမွည့္ကိုေတာ့ လူတိုင္းနီးပါး ၾကိဳက္ႏွစ္သက္ၾကမွာပါ။ အရသာခ်ိဳခ်ိဳအီအီေလးနဲ႔ ရင့္မွည့္လာရင္ႏွစ္လိုစဖြယ္ အေရာင္အဆင္းရွိတဲ့ သေဘာၤသီးမွည့္ကို အားလံုးပဲ စားဖူးၾကပါလိမ့္မယ္။ ဒါေၾကာင့္ သေဘာၤသီးမွည့္ စားသံုးျခင္းျဖင့္ ရရွိေစႏိုင္မယ့္ အက်ိဳးေက်းဇူးေတြကိုေဖာ္ျပေပးလိုက္ပါတယ္ အစားအေသာက္ႏွစ္သက္သူ ကိုကိုမမတို႕ေရ..။သေဘၤာသီးမွည့္စားရင္ ရႏိုင္မယ့္ အက်ိဳးေက်းဇူးေတြကေတာ့-၁။ အသားအေရကို လွပါေစပါတယ္သေဘာၤသီးမွာ ပါ၀င္တဲ့ မ်ားစြာေသာ ဓာတ္သဘာ၀ေတြဟာ အသားအေရကို လွပေစပီး အရြယ္တင္ႏုပ်ိဳမႈကိုလည္း ထိန္းသိမ္းေပးႏိုင္စြမ္းရွိပါတယ္။၂။ ကိုယ္ေလးခ်ိန္ကိုေလ်ာ့ခ်ေပးနိုင္သေဘာၤသီးမွာ ပါ၀င္တဲ့ အမွ်င္ဓာတ္ေတြ၊ ဗီတာမင္စီေတြက ကိုယ္အေလးခ်ိန္ကိုေလွ်ာ့ခ်ေပးႏိုင္စြမ္းရွိပါတယ္။ သေဘာၤသီးမွည့္ စားသံုးျခင္းဟာခႏၶာကိုယ္အေလးခ်ိန္ေလွ်ာ့ခ်ေနသူမ်ားအဖို႕ ေကာင္းစြာသင့္ေတာ္ျပီး ဗိုက္ဆာေလာင္မႈကိုလည္း အခ်ိန္အတန္ၾကာ ထိန္းထားေပးႏိုင္ပါတယ္။၃။ ဆီးခ်ိဳေရာဂါေ၀ဒနာရွင္မ်ားအတြက္ သင့္ေတာ္ပါတယ္သေဘာၤသီးမွည့္ရဲ႕ အရသာဟာ ခ်ိဳတယ္ဆိုေပမယ့္ သေဘာၤသီးမွည့္ထဲမွာ သၾကားဓာတ္ပါ၀င္မႈႏႈန္းက နည္းပါးပါတယ္။ ဒါေၾကာင့္မို႕လို႕ သေဘာၤသီးမွည့္ကို ဆီးခ်ိဳေရာဂါေ၀ဒနာရွင္မ်ား အထူးတလည္ေရွာင္ရွားေနစရာမလိုတဲ့ အျပင္ အျခားေသာ ဗီတာမင္ဓာတ္ေတြက ဆီးခ်ိဳေၾကာင့္ျဖစ္တတ္တဲ့ ဆင့္ကဲေရာဂါမ်ားကိုေတာင္ ဟန္႕တားကာကြယ္ႏိုင္တယ္လို႕ ေဆးပညာရွင္မ်ားက ညႊန္းဆိုၾကပါတယ္။၄။ ဝမ္းခ်ဳပ္ရင္စားသေဘာၤသီးမွည့္ ခပ္ေပ်ာ့ေပ်ာ့က ဓာတ္ခ်ဳပ္၊၀မ္းခ်ဳပ္ေနသူမ်ားအတြက္ေတာ့ေဆးတစ္လက္ပါပဲ။ ပံုမွန္အားျဖင့္ အစာခ်ဖ်က္မႈအားနည္းတာေၾကာင့္ ၀မ္းခ်ဳပ္ေနသူမ်ား သေဘာၤသီးမွည့္ကို စားေပးျခင္းျဖင့္ အစာေခ်ဖ်က္မႈကို အားေကာင္းေစျပီး ၀မ္းကိုလည္းေအးျမေစပါတယ္။၅။ ကိုယ္ခံအားေကာင္းေစသေဘာၤသီးမွည့္မွာ ပါ၀င္ေနတဲ့ ဗီတာမင္စီ ဓာတ္က ကိုယ္ခံအားက်ဆင္းမႈမွ တားဆီးကာကြယ္ေပးပါတယ္။ ကိုယ္ခံအားေကာင္းမြန္ေနျပီဆိုရင္ေတာ့ျပင္ပမွေရာဂါဘယမ်ား ကူးစက္၀င္ေရာက္လာမႈကို အေကာင္းဆံုး ခုခံေပးႏိုင္ပါတယ္။ ဗီတာမင္ စီ က ကိုယ္ခံအားေကာင္းမြန္ဖို႕အတြက္ အေကာင္းဆံုးျဖည့္တင္းေပးႏိုင္ပါတယ္။၆။ အဆစ္အျမစ္ေရာင္ရမ္းျခင္းမွကာကြယ္အဆစ္အျမစ္ေတြေရာင္ရမ္းျခင္းဟာ ခႏၶာကိုယ္တြင္း ဗီတာမင္စီ ခ်ိဳ႕တဲ့မႈေၾကာင့္ျဖစ္ပါတယ္။ သေဘာၤသီးမွာ ဗီတာမင္ စီ အျပည့္အ၀ပါ၀င္တာေၾကာင့္ အဆစ္အျမစ္ေရာင္ရမ္းေနသူေတြအတြက္ သေဘာၤသီးမွည့္ စားသံုးျခင္းေၾကာင့္ အဆိုပါေရာဂါမွ သက္သာေစႏိုင္ပါတယ္။ ဒါ့အျပင္ေခ်ာင္းဆိုးေရာဂါ၊ အဆုတ္ေရာဂါ၊ တီဘီေရာဂါမ်ား အတြက္လည္းေကာင္းမြန္ပါတယ္။၇။ စိတ္ဖိစီးမႈေတြကိုေလ်ာ့ေစလုပ္ငန္းခြင္အတြင္းျဖစ္ေစ၊ စာသင္ခန္းအတြင္းျဖစ္ေစ၊ ကိုယ္လက္လႈပ္ရွားမႈ မ်ားလြန္းလို႕ မအီမသာျဖစ္လို႕ပဲျဖစ္ေစ သေဘာၤသီးမွည့္ ခ်ိဳခ်ိဳေအးေအးေလးကို စားသံုးၾကည့္လိုက္ပါ။ ခ်ိဳေမႊးတဲ့အရသာ၊ေအးျမတ့ဲ ခံစားမႈေၾကာင့္ စိတ္ဖိစီးညိဳးႏြမ္းမႈေတြေျပေပ်ာက္ေစျပီး တက္ၾကြလန္းဆန္းေစပါတယ္။Credit : Duwun   အဓိကကောင်းကျိုးကတော့ မျက်စိအားကောင်းစေပြီး ဝမ်းမှန်စေတာပါပဲ။သင်္ဘောသီးမှည့်ကိုတော့ လူတိုင်းနီးပါး ကြိုက်နှစ်သက်ကြမှာပါ။ အရသာချိုချိုအီအီလေးနဲ့ ရင့်မှည့်လာရင် နှစ်လိုစဖွယ် အရောင်အဆင်းရှိတဲ့ သဘောၤသီးမှည့်ကို အားလုံးပဲ စားဖူးကြပါလိမ့်မယ်။ ဒါကြောင့် သဘောၤသီးမှည့် စားသုံးခြင်းဖြင့် ရရှိစေနိုင်မယ့် အကျိုးကျေးဇူးတွေကို ဖော်ပြပေးလိုက်ပါတယ် အစားအသောက်နှစ်သက်သူ ကိုကိုမမတို့ရေ..။သင်္ဘောသီးမှည့်စားရင် ရနိုင်မယ့် အကျိုးကျေးဇူးတွေကတော့-၁။ အသားအရေကို လှပါစေပါတယ်သဘောၤသီးမှာ ပါဝင်တဲ့ များစွာသော ဓာတ်သဘာဝတွေဟာ အသားအရေကို လှပစေပီး အရွယ်တင်နုပျိုမှုကိုလည်း ထိန်းသိမ်းပေးနိုင်စွမ်းရှိပါတယ်။၂။ ကိုယ်လေးချိန်ကို လျော့ချပေးနိုင်သဘောၤသီးမှာ ပါဝင်တဲ့ အမျှင်ဓာတ်တွေ၊ ဗီတာမင်စီ တွေက ကိုယ်အလေးချိန်ကို လျှော့ချပေးနိုင်စွမ်းရှိပါတယ်။ သဘောၤသီးမှည့် စားသုံးခြင်းဟာခန္ဓာကိုယ်အလေးချိန် လျှော့ချနေသူများအဖို့ ကောင်းစွာသင့်တော်ပြီး ဗိုက်ဆာလောင်မှုကိုလည်း အချိန်အတန်ကြာ ထိန်းထားပေးနိုင်ပါတယ်။၃။ ဆီးချိုရောဂါ ဝေဒနာရှင်များအတွက် သင့်တော်ပါတယ်သဘောၤသီးမှည့်ရဲ့ အရသာဟာ ချိုတယ်ဆိုပေမယ့် သဘောၤသီးမှည့်ထဲမှာ သကြားဓာတ်ပါဝင်မှုနှုန်းက နည်းပါးပါတယ်။ ဒါကြောင့်မို့လို့ သဘောၤသီးမှည့်ကို ဆီးချိုရောဂါ ဝေဒနာရှင်များ အထူးတလည် ရှောင်ရှားနေစရာမလိုတဲ့ အပြင် အခြားသော ဗီတာမင်ဓာတ်တွေက ဆီးချိုကြောင့် ဖြစ်တတ်တဲ့ ဆင့်ကဲရောဂါများကိုတောင် ဟန့်တားကာကွယ်နိုင်တယ်လို့ ဆေးပညာရှင်များက ညွှန်းဆိုကြပါတယ်။၄။ ဝမ်းချုပ်ရင်စားသဘောၤသီးမှည့် ခပ်ပျော့ပျော့က ဓာတ်ချုပ်၊ဝမ်းချုပ်နေသူများအတွက်တော့ ဆေးတစ်လက်ပါပဲ။ ပုံမှန်အားဖြင့် အစာချဖျက်မှုအားနည်းတာကြောင့် ဝမ်းချုပ်နေသူများ သဘောၤသီးမှည့်ကို စားပေးခြင်းဖြင့် အစာချေဖျက်မှုကို အားကောင်းစေပြီး ဝမ်းကိုလည်း အေးမြစေပါတယ်။၅။ ကိုယ်ခံအားကောင်းစေသဘောၤသီးမှည့်မှာ ပါဝင်နေတဲ့ ဗီတာမင်စီ ဓာတ်က ကိုယ်ခံအားကျဆင်းမှုမှ တားဆီးကာကွယ်ပေးပါတယ်။ ကိုယ်ခံအားကောင်းမွန်နေပြီဆိုရင်တော့ပြင်ပမှ ရောဂါဘယများ ကူးစက်ဝင်ရောက်လာမှုကို အကောင်းဆုံး ခုခံပေးနိုင်ပါတယ်။ ဗီတာမင် စီ က ကိုယ်ခံအားကောင်းမွန်ဖို့အတွက် အကောင်းဆုံးဖြည့်တင်းပေးနိုင်ပါတယ်။၆။ အဆစ်အမြစ်ရောင်ရမ်းခြင်းမှကာကွယ်အဆစ်အမြစ်တွေ ရောင်ရမ်းခြင်းဟာ ခန္ဓာကိုယ်တွင်း ဗီတာမင်စီ ချို့တဲ့မှုကြောင့် ဖြစ်ပါတယ်။ သဘောၤသီးမှာ ဗီတာမင် စီ အပြည့်အဝပါဝင်တာကြောင့် အဆစ်အမြစ် ရောင်ရမ်းနေသူတွေအတွက် သဘောၤသီးမှည့် စားသုံးခြင်းကြောင့် အဆိုပါ ရောဂါမှ သက်သာစေနိုင်ပါတယ်။ ဒါ့အပြင် ချောင်းဆိုးရောဂါ၊ အဆုတ်ရောဂါ၊ တီဘီ ရောဂါများ အတွက်လည်း ကောင်းမွန်ပါတယ်။၇။ စိတ်ဖိစီးမှုတွေကို လျော့စေလုပ်ငန်းခွင်အတွင်း ဖြစ်စေ၊ စာသင်ခန်းအတွင်း ဖြစ်စေ၊ ကိုယ်လက်လှုပ်ရှားမှု များလွန်းလို့ မအီမသာဖြစ်လို့ပဲ ဖြစ်စေ သဘောၤသီးမှည့် ချိုချိုအေးအေးလေးကို စားသုံးကြည့်လိုက်ပါ။ ချိုမွှေးတဲ့အရသာ၊ အေးမြတဲ့ ခံစားမှုကြောင့် စိတ်ဖိစီးညိုးနွမ်းမှုတွေ ပြေပျောက်စေပြီး တက်ကြွလန်းဆန်းစေပါတယ်။Credit : Duwunဤစာဖတ်သူများအားလုံးပျော်ရွင်ချမ်းမြေ့ကြပါစေလို့ရွှေချစ်သူမှဆုတောင်းမေတ္တာပို့သပေးပါတယ်။မျှဝေပေးခြင်းဟာလည်းမေတ္တာတစ်မျိုးပဲမို့ မျှဝေပေးပါနော်...

posts.author: Emzah92
posts.title: Blue Planet II is the biggest show of 2017: First episode of the series was watched by 14 million viewers
posts.text: in General Blue Planet II has become the most-watched programme of 2017 and the most popular natural history series in 15 years.New figures show the first episode of the BBC’s landmark natural history series, narrated by Sir David Attenborough, was watched by 14.01million. Opening - Instalment - Fans - Footage - Gender The opening instalment gripped fans with footage of fish changing gender and an extraordinary hunting scene where a fish leapt out of the sea to catch a bird.And it proved even more popular than any episode of Planet Earth II last year, the most-watched of which attracted 13.1million viewers. Bumper - Audience - Programme - TV - Year The bumper audience eclipses any programme on TV this year, pulling in over 2 million more viewers than the One Love Manchester concert in June, and 1.7million more than any episode of Strictly Come Dancing.Ahead of the launch of Blue Planet II, which has been serialised in the Mail’s Weekend magazine, there had been questions raised about whether viewers would warm to marine wildlife in the same way they did the characters of Planet Earth II. Audience - Figures - Programme - Days And the consolidated audience figures, which include those who watched the programme up to seven days after it was shown on...   Mail Online 0

thread.title: Thinking of taking my 6 yr old out of school, yr 2. Anyone done this? She’s so unhappy
thread.title_full: Thinking of taking my 6 yr old out of school, yr 2. Anyone done this? She’s so unhappy | Mumsnet Discussion

posts.author: mrsreynolds
posts.text:
Yes
I took ds1 (14) out in year 2
He had undx dyslexia and was struggling - but no behaviour issues so school Just weren't interested
He was also badly bullied by the same child for 3 years
It was the best thing we could have done
I had a 15 month old at home so.it wasn't always easy but it really helped him
He went back to a different school 2nd term of year 3 and loved it
- dh and i did lots of interventions with him and he is now doing well on year 10
I found the home ed board on mn so helpful and supportive
Good luck x

thread.title: Customers To Now Buy Electricity Direct From Gencos - FG
thread.title_full: Customers To Now Buy Electricity Direct From Gencos - FG

posts.title: Customers To Now Buy Electricity Direct From Gencos - FG
posts.text: Customers Now To Buy Electricity Direct From Gencos - FG by dre11 ( m ): 7:08am By Simon Echewofun Sunday The Minister of Power, Works and Housing, Mr Babatunde Fashola, yesterday endorsed the regulation for the ‘Eligible Customer’ for four categories of customers that he declared on May 15, 2017. The regulation which was approved by commissioners at the Nigerian Electricity Regulatory Commission (NERC) on November 1 and presented to Fashola on Monday, is expected to enable Large Power Users (LPU) have options to get electricity from operators other than the 11 Distribution Companies (DisCos).With the declaration and subsequent roll out of the regulation, each of the four categories of eligible customers in the electricity market now has an option; either to contract supply directly from the Generation Companies (GenCos) or to demand robust supply regime from their DisCos.The new regulation of NERC obtained by Daily Trust set out certain customers that can buy power directly from the GenCos without passing through the 11 DisCos as has been the case. These customers can exit from a DisCo after a three-month notice to it, and also reconnect following same procedure, the regulation says.Speaking after the presentation at his office in Abuja, yesterday, Fashola noted that NERC is the umpire of the power sector and gives effect through regulations to policy statements of the ministry. The minister who recounted the gains and challenges of the new regulation, said it will help more customers to get power supply and ensure that more private investments are brought into the distribution value chain of the sector.Presenting the regulation earlier, the Vice Chairman of NERC, Engr. Sanusi Garba, said the commission formed an internal committee led by Shamsudeen Mahmud who led a team of professionals to draft the consultation paper.”The commission also benefited from technical advisory support from USAID because we needed to leverage on the experience of the emerging economies in the area of eligible customers.The commission has set a two phased implementation process beginning with the immediate registration of customers who are eligible to cut off from the DisCos and have their electricity supply through the GenCos or the Transmission Company of Nigeria (TCN).There is potential for loss of some customers at the 11 DisCos which may result in lower revenues for the incumbent regulated utilities. The DisCos through the Association of Nigerian Electricity Distributors (ANED), said the sector was not ripe for the declaration.In an earlier position presented by their spokesman, Mr Sunday Oduntan, ANED spoke on the backdrop of the electricity market not being competitive at this stage to trigger the declaration.Addressing this, NERC said the commission expects that since some customers will cut out from the DisCos, they should have more power to give to the existing customers to raise their revenue.In the regulation, there is a provision for what is described as tariff rebalancing. Daily Trust reports that in a situation where the impact of the exit of some eligible customers significantly impacts on the recovery of approved revenues by the DisCos, NERC may consider tariff rebalancing and that, “the impact of the rebalancing may require a slight revision of tariffs for some classes of customers.”There is also another section, the Competition Transition Charge (CTC) which is backed by Section 28 of the Electric Power Sector Reform (EPSR) Act 2005. The CTC, according to the regulation, will be an additional 20 per cent of the tariff being paid by the eligible customer.The Association of Power Generating Companies (APGC) backed the declaration. The group, which represents the GenCos, said the declaration will ensure that issues of over 2,000mw stranded electricity generation and poor market liquidity will be resolved as the DisCos are not remitting enough to the market to boost further sector investments, the Executive Secretary, Dr. Joy Ogaji, said in an earlier statement.She also noted that issues of load rejection by DisCos will be over as such excess power will be channeled to the eligible customers and no longer to the DisCos.President, Nigeria Consumer Protection Network, Mr. Kunle Olubiyo, said declaring eligible customers became important to drive competition in the post privatisation era, he said.

thread.title: Thinking of taking my 6 yr old out of school, yr 2. Anyone done this? She’s so unhappy
thread.title_full: Thinking of taking my 6 yr old out of school, yr 2. Anyone done this? She’s so unhappy | Mumsnet Discussion

posts.author: JamesDelayneysTattoos
posts.text:
Thank you for your comments. We do suspect ASD, our older Dd is dx, she’s 10. They’re very different, older Dd is a master masker and Little Dd is way more open and obvious.
She has no social awareness, she’ll start mature conversations (for a 6 year old) with anyone. She initiates conversations by complimenting the person on something about them, ie, Hi, your name is ....name badge, I really like your earrings, do you like working here? Are you having a good day? For instance, but has no understanding of taking turns in the conversation. I think is how the friendships at school become complicated maybe.
She is fearless when it comes to risk taking in a playground for instance, doesn’t seem to feel pain as intensely as other kids her age, yet has a complete phobia about rain and wind. The sound terrifies her. Loud noises scare her.
She’ll watch movies on a loop without talking, then start re-enacting them word for word. She’d happily watch the same movie 4,5 times in a row if time (and me) allowed.
I’ve just rung gp but can’t get an appointment until next Tuesday. I guess it’s not an emergency so will have to wait. I’ve given her an ice pop because she says her mouth feels sore. The headaches are new this week.

thread.title: Germany’s Greens Drop Key Demands Ahead Of Crunch Coalition Talks
thread.title_full: Germany’s Greens Drop Key Demands Ahead Of Crunch Coalition Talks

posts.author: n.king
posts.title: Germany’s Greens Drop Key Demands Ahead Of Crunch Coalition Talks
posts.text: in General BERLIN (Reuters) – The leaders of Germany’s Greens said on Tuesday they would not insist on fixed dates to shut down coal-fired power stations and ban cars with internal combustion engines, dropping two key demands ahead of crunch coalition talks with other parties.German Chancellor Angela Merkel, whose conservative bloc came first but lost seats in a federal election in September, is trying to forge a tricky three-way alliance with the Greens and the pro-business FDP that is untested at national level. Weeks - Talks - Parties - Climate - Energy Despite weeks of exploratory talks, the parties remain far apart on climate, energy and immigration policy and they disagree on where the blame lies for the lack of progress.A lack of progress in coalition talks would mean that Germany faces a lengthy period of drift at a time when Europe’s biggest economy is firing on all cylinders and many in Europe look to Berlin for leadership on issues ranging from euro zone governance to trans-Atlantic ties. Power - Station - Grid - Co-leader - Simone “For us, it doesn’t matter if the last coal-fired power station is off the grid in 2030 or 2032. That’s where we are pragmatic,” Greens co-leader Simone Peter told Rheinische Post newspaper ahead of the next round of negotiations.Peter said, however, that it was crucial to agree on further climate protection measures in order to reduce Germany’s CO2 emissions by 40 percent until 2020 compared...   www.oann.com 3

posts.author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
posts.title: Hockey: 'Jobless Goalkeeper' Savita hopes Asia Cup win ends nine-year wait | Hockey
posts.text: 'Jobless Goalkeeper' Savita hopes Asia Cup win ends nine-year wait 'Jobless Goalkeeper' Savita hopes Asia Cup win ends nine-year wait "I have been trying for a job for last nine years. I was promised a job under the Haryana Government's 'Medal Lao, Naukri Pao' scheme, but I have only been given assurances by officers. I am 27 now and still depend on my father's income," Savita Punia said. PTI | Updated: Nov 7, 2017, 15:06 IST Highlights Savita also starred in India's bronze medal effort in Junior Asia Cup in 2009. Savita had applied for a coaching job with SAI after Rio Olympics but did not get any response from them. Savita hopes that Asia Cup win will help her to get a job. Savita has just completed 150 caps in Asia Cup. (AFP Photo) NEW DELHI: India goalkeeper Savita Punia has received many accolades for her on-field heroics but she could not secure a job for herself despite all the success in a nine-year international career. Last Sunday, Savita produced a stunning save in a tense shootout in the thrilling final against China to help India win the Asia Cup women's hockey title and secure a berth in next year's World Cup. The team broke a 13-year-old jinx when Savita foiled an attempt from the rivals to ensure a 5-4 win. India had failed to qualify for the last World Cup and finished ninth in the 2010 edition. "I am very happy that I could contribute in team's win. I work harder to bring more laurels and will not let my unemployment affect my game," Savita said after team's return from Japan. "I have been trying for a job for last nine years. I was promised a job under the Haryana Government's 'Medal Lao, Naukri Pao' scheme, but I have only been given assurances by officers. "I am 27 now and still depend on my father's income. I am playing for my country for last 9 years and every time after a win, I hope to get a job but nothing changes." Savita, who hails from Hisar, made her international debut in 2008 and has just completed 150 caps in Asia Cup. She started playing Hockey as per the wish of her grandfather Mahinder Singh and starred in India's bronze medal effort in Junior Asia Cup in 2009. "I should take care of my parents but it is opposite in my case. My father is a pharmacist and it is not easy to run a family with his solo income," said Savita. She had also applied for a coaching job with SAI after Rio Olympics but did not get any response from them. "Sometimes I get very tense when I see my parents. My mother is worried that I don't have a job. My father encourages me to do well and I never let my game affected with my unemployment. But it is constantly in my mind when I am out of the ground," she said. Savita hopes that Asia Cup win will help her to get a job. "We have a sports minister who has been an Olympic medallist. I hope he will understand this and this title win also help me to get a job," she said while giving credit to goal-keeping coach Bharat Chhetri and chief coach Harendra Singh for her performance. "I also hope that this will raise the profile of women Hockey in India and more girls will take up the game." Get latest news & live updates on the go on your pc with News App . Download The Times of India news app for your device. RELATED

thread.title: AMD, Intel hate Nvidia so much they're building a laptop chip to spite it
thread.title_full: AMD, Intel hate Nvidia so much they're building a laptop chip to spite it

posts.author: HelloimMe
posts.title: AMD, Intel hate Nvidia so much they're building a laptop chip to spite it
posts.text: in General Analysis Arch-rivals AMD and Intel have put aside their animosity toward each other, and united against a common foe: Nvidia.On Monday the pair revealed they are working on a chip family that will combine an Intel Core x86 processor, a customized AMD Radeon GPU, and HBM2 – high-bandwidth memory – all in one package. The silicon will, we're told, hit the market in the first quarter of 2018 in thin and lightweight notebooks, allowing them to, it is hoped, play top-end games. Chipset - Intel - H-series - Core - Family Specifically, the chipset will use Intel's eight-generation H-series Core family, presumably from its Kaby Lake blueprints, and an AMD Radeon-branded architecture, either Vega or Polaris. Both Chipzilla and mini-Chipzilla are keeping quiet on the exact specifications until launch. It appears Intel is buying the GPU silicon from AMD, and using a driver from its new best friend, rather than licensing technology.Crucially, Intel will use its Embedded Multi-Die Interconnect Bridge (EMIB) technique to glue the GPU tightly to the HBM2 RAM to increase performance and lower the power drain. The AMD part is then wired to the x86 system-on-chip as usual, presumably via PCIe. Core - Processor - Intel - GPU - Beefier It's quite possible the Core processor could keep its built-in Intel GPU, activating the beefier AMD Radeon part as needed when firing up a game, or similar, which would give the computer greater control over its power usage. The H-series is power hungry, has a basic builtin GT2 GPU, and thus with a decent AMD part strapped on could be a good fit in a gaming-friendly notebook.EMIB essentially places two separate dies on a common substrate with buried copper interconnects transferring signals and power. It's a more compact, high speed, and energy efficient arrangement than discrete components talking to each other over a PCB, which is ideal for squashing the technology into a laptop. Intel has been...   www.theregister.co.uk 2

thread.title: 【體檢中心的早與晚】有個耶撚大鬧體檢反人類
thread.title_full: 【體檢中心的早與晚】有個耶撚大鬧體檢反人類

posts.author: 體檢小子
posts.title: 【體檢中心的早與晚】有個耶撚大鬧體檢反人類
posts.text:
通常一間體檢中心，每一年左右都會推出一項新的檢查，或者新的服務。而近呢幾年呢，通常新推出的檢查，都屬於基因檢測類別。但係，不嬲對部份的香港人黎講，一聽到「基因」兩隻字，成日都會變得好抗拒。你驗血、驗肺、驗尿驗咩都得，一驗基因就唔得。但其實亦都唔洗太奇怪，市面上唔少化妝品、食物，都打著「天然」、「無激素」、「有機」、「無基因改造」的旗號，而香港人聽左咁多年，或多或少都對基因兩字有負面睇法。
因此，每當我地提到有「癌症基因檢測」、「糖尿病基因檢測」，客人就會即刻質疑個檢測對身體有無害之類。而有另一部份的人，就會質疑基因檢測的成效，話基因檢測無用架。
我就覺得，癌症、糖尿病基因檢測，只係話人你聽，你有幾大機會中呢兩種病，機會低唔代表將來唔會有病，機會高亦唔代表一定出事。就好像有人食煙食足三十年，都一樣無肺癌；有人唔食煙都生肺癌，問你死未？基因檢測只係話比你聽「機會率」。所以，有人質疑佢既成效，亦都唔出奇。
不過呢，早前就有個師姐，分享左一個故事比我聽。
話說，有位大陸女士，佢本身信奉基督教，因為大陸就唔比照超聲波分辨男女，於是佢趁住個肚仲未大，偷偷和老公南下香港來到我地公司照超聲波。咁呢，一見到孕婦，通常我地就會同佢介紹「天賦基因檢測」。天賦基因檢測即係等個ＢＢ出左世之後，透過檢測方式，搵出ＢＢ的天份，有邊方面既能力比較強，適合比咩栽培佢。
本來爸爸都聽得好同意，畢竟人一出世就知自己有咩叻，日後揀發展方向時就無咁易出錯。但係，阿媽聽到之後就爆晒脾氣。
「怎麼可以參加這種測試？」太太對她老豆說。
「甚麼事，這樣不好嗎？」老公一面疑惑。
「這種測試，上帝是不容許的，我們人類不應該嘗試去打聽上帝不許我們知道的事，這是『反人類』行為。」之後
「難道上帝又容許你我照超聲波，看胎兒的性別嗎？」老公唔GUR 又嘈返過去。
其實又無講錯，老老實實，假如打聽個仔有咩天賦才能係「反人類」，唔通照完超聲波睇下男定女就唔係「反人類」咩？有Ｄ父母知道個胎係女仔會殺埋佢添，呢Ｄ就真係反人類喇。都唔係雙重標準到咁掛。
之後個老婆仲大鬧我師姐，話我地唔應該引入上帝唔容許的檢測，鬧鬧下，本來個老公係同老婆對鬧，忽然個老公可能想轉移老婆注意力，就一齊鬧埋我地一份，堅係夠無奈，最後場面少少失控，公司派左成班人送佢走，仲打個折比佢。
耶撚邊度都有，體檢中心自然都唔會少，耶撚加大陸人的組合，更加係無堅不摧。

thread.title: Marks & Spencer launches 2017 Christmas campaign with Paddington Bear
thread.title_full: Marks & Spencer launches 2017 Christmas campaign with Paddington Bear

posts.author: Vivian Hendriksz
posts.title: Marks & Spencer launches 2017 Christmas campaign with Paddington Bear
posts.text:
Marks & Spencer has teamed up with an iconic British character for its 2017 Christmas Campaign - Paddington Bear. The beloved bear, who stars in the family film, Paddington 2, to be released November 10, is the central character in M&S advert 'Paddington and the Christmas Visitor' launching November 7. 
The department store's Christmas campaign, which launches today under the hashtag #LoveTheBear, includes the advert, created by Grey London, an in-store dedicated campaign as well as online and social additions such as an interview with Paddington and downloadable marmalade recipes. The 'Paddington and the Christmas Visitor' advert follows the tale of how Paddington bear unknowingly saves Christmas for this friends and neighbours by mistaking a burglar for Santa Claus. M&S launched fully integrated Christmas Campaign starring Paddington Bear 
"At M&S our customers are at the heart of everything we do and we know they love the magic of Christmas, most of all spending time with family and friends," said Patrick Bousquet-Chavanne, Executive Director of Customer, Marketing & M&S.com. "Paddington has enchanted children and families all over the world for nearly 60 years which is why we couldn’t turn down the chance to bring the wonderfully endearing, much-loved British character and his world into the heart of our Christmas campaign this year. We always want to surprise and delight our customers.” "> 
M&S has also turned its advert into a children's Christmas storybook, a first for the department store, which is currently available online and in store for 3 pounds. All proceeds from the children's book sales will be donated to the NSPCC to help fund its Childline service during the festive season. To mark the launch of the book, M&S is set to host a series of book readings for children, beginning at its flagship store at Marble Arch on November 10. 
In addition, the department store will also be hosting dedicated screenings of the Paddington 2 film for Sparks members and their children in the ten communities it is supporting through its Plan A 2025. Marks & Spencer will also create dedicated Paddington Shops in 78 of its stores, which will house over 90 theme products and selfie stations. From December onwards, M&S's team of in-store 'Moment Makers' will also be on hand to surprise customers with Paddington-themed 'Random Acts of Kindness' which range from a free marmalade sandwich to chocolates at the till. 
“Paddington injects the sense of joy, love and neighbourly spirit that makes Christmas feel magical and our story reflects the inclusive, make the most of every moment approach that we take to our customer conversations," added Rob Weston, Brand & Marketing Director at M&S. The 2017 Christmas Campaign echoes Marks & Spencer 'Spend it Well' campaign, launched earlier this year, as it encourages customers to focus on experiences, people and the things that matter the most to them. 
Photos: Courtesy of M&S

thread.title: 急聘、加薪、招兼职：快递业招兵买马备战“双１１”
thread.title_full: 急聘、加薪、招兼职：快递业招兵买马备战“双１１”

posts.author: netease
posts.title: 急聘、加薪、招兼职：快递业招兵买马备战“双１１”
posts.text: （原标题：急聘、加薪、招兼职：快递业招兵买马备战“双１１”） 急聘、加薪、招兼职：快递业招兵买马备战“双１１” 新华社沈阳１１月７日电（王炳坤、李宇佳）“双１１”将至，电商和市民都为“买买买”摩拳擦掌，快递公司更是不敢怠慢，纷纷提前应对物流高峰。面对人手紧张，“急聘”“加薪”“招兼职”成为眼下快递业的关键词。 记者在多家招聘网站上看到，包括“三通一达”在内的多家快递公司长期发布招聘信息，进入１０月下旬信息数量明显增多。在沈阳皇姑区一处网点，记者一提到招聘，网点负责人立马回答：“招！你来不来？”他介绍，公司对应聘者几乎零门槛，能服从安排按时送件即可，他们还提供电动车等交通工具。 据国家邮政局预测，今年“双１１”期间（从１１月１１日至１１月１６日）全行业的快递处理总量将超１５亿件，快递人员需求量超过３００万人。目前全国快递从业者２００万人，这中间存在的１００万人缺口仍需通过短期招聘或其他方式解决。 随着人手紧张，各快递网点纷纷提高待遇争夺人力资源。记者了解到，目前快递司机、内勤、装车工的收入普遍比去年上浮２０％左右，而最为辛苦的快递员，其每件快递的提成也调高了三四成。 面对“双１１”大考，很多快递公司都与网购平台签订了“军令状”，保证不“爆仓”，为此它们在招收兼职人员上做 文章 。沈阳市沈河区一家快递分部为了应急，打出临时招聘信息，从１１月１１日至２０日的１０天底薪为２０００元，相当于每天２００元。 尽管各大公司想方设法优待快递员，但“双１１”期间的工作并不轻松。多家网点的负责人介绍，为确保不出现货物积压，这期间员工都得加班加点，快递员们往往要从早晨六七点一直工作到晚上七八点，而且是连续多日连轴转。希望广大消费者对快递员多一分理解和宽容，有时候一个微笑、一句谢谢、一个好评，就是对这些“奔跑者”们最大的支持和肯定。 (原标题：急聘、加薪、招兼职：快递业招兵买马备战“双１１”) 本文来源：新华社新媒体专线 责任编辑：王晓易_NE0011

thread.title: Fellow jungle mains, how do you stay mindful all game?
thread.title_full: Fellow jungle mains, how do you stay mindful all game? : summonerschool

posts.author: MacIntyreGaming
posts.text:
Play champs with tons of applicable utility. Champs where you can gank, invade, push, or take objectives equally potently on (Kayn is a great example, but there are others. Kindred, Evelynn, and Kayn are my favorites.) Always look for the next big move. Bring tracker's knife and make vision your minigame.
Jungle is the least boring role in the game. It has dozens of little nuances and there's always something you could be paying more attention to. Make sure the lanes are autopushing during big fight setups, make sure the map isn't dark, check for wards with oracle's and vision plants, take scuttles to deny vision from the enemy and give them to your team. Place strategic wards from level 1-2 and track the enemy jg, taking advantage of their absences.
There are so many things you can do. Autopilot should never be an issue for a jungler

posts.author: スマ姐さん 2017/11/07(火) 18:22:11.19 ID:0DbCy7xf
posts.text:
初代です。
地図スレはわたし建ててないですよ。
私が最近たてたのはくるみちゃん専用スレです。
だけど私が書き込むとクセとかでばれてスレ過疎らしたくないので地図スレにしてもほぼ私は姐さん方の書き込みみてるだけです。
あとわたしが1レスでも書き込むと自演してるんじゃないかと思われて地図スレの姐さん方が疑心暗鬼になるのは避けたいです。
かといって私が中居アンチかというとアンチではないです。
なぜならつよしんごろうは中居を嫌うような人たちではないのはわかってるからです。
ただ興味応援の差の違いによる温度差が私を中居アンチと錯覚させるのでしょうね。
それはわたしだけ責められる覚えはないですし、別に私がそうだからそれに影響受けるひとは皆無でしょう。

thread.title: 7 - Dr. Linus
